title: Every Inch Australian
creator_credit: Roland Litchfield, Litchfield Films and ACTIL
brief_description: Gives a complete picture of processes used in the manufacture of cotton sheeting at the Actil plant at Woodville, South Australia. Emphasis is placed on the scientific control and checking of all production processes from the arrival of bales of raw cotton to the final packing of Actil products and their despatch to all parts of Australia.
